Stand Out and Book More Jobs.

Are you over your lackluster website? There’s no better time for web design that showcases your company to build amazing results.

Home – Website Design Agency – Construction Web Design Agency

Do you find your website underwhelming?

The fact is, it shouldn’t be. Your website should be an amazing representation of your company.

 

When it’s not, you’re making the wrong impression or being entirely overlooked by visitors.

 

You need an ally who can help you design a site that’s fit for your brand and is loved by your clients and partners. When you achieve this, great results follow.

Trusted By

Here To Help

Three ways we help construction companies succeed

Memorable, modern web design

Great website design isn’t just appreciated – it’s expected.

 

Let’s design a site that leaves the right impression of your brand and delivers an intuitive user experience visitors remember.

 

If you get the design right, your construction website will be memorable and irresistible.

Book A Strategy Session

“The Design team was really great. We love the new look and feel. They took our feedback and were really able to bring what we were envisioning to life.”

Ali Bedwell, VP of Brand Strategy, Skyline Enterprises

Hit your key metrics

Turning a website visitor into your next job on the books is no easy task.

 

Website design that provides a great user experience and resonates with visitors through messaging wins every time.

 

You need a partner that understands great website design is more than just looks, it needs to accomplish tangible business goals.

Book A Strategy Session

“Jorbanwas great to work with. Their company brought really amazing ideas to the table. Can’t wait to work with them again on more projects.”

Justin Grundfast, Creative Director at STV Inc

Make your competition jealous

Chances are you have some competition.

 

It is absolutely critical for your brand to stand out amongst all of the options.

 

A memorable website will not only showcase your brand in its best light – it’ll help persuade clients into partnering with you.

Book A Strategy Session

“Jorbanhas truly seen where we can take the website and make it look significantly different from all of our competitors. That’s been our main reason for engaging them. If you’re looking for a vendor with a unique perspective, then Jorbanis the firm.”

Scott Greenberg, Former Director of Integrated Marketing Communications at HITT

FAQS

Top Construction Website Design Questions We’re Asked

How much does a construction website design cost?

 

The cost to build a website can vary greatly depending on the complexity of the software, the features and functionality required, the level of customization, and the experience of the development team. A basic website could cost anywhere from $25,000 to $75,000, while a more complex and feature-rich platform could cost upwards of $200,000 or more.

It is important to work with a reputable and experienced development team that can provide a detailed proposal outlining the project, the scope of work and associated costs. It is also important to consider ongoing maintenance and support costs, as well as any additional fees for hosting and infrastructure.

Overall, the cost to build a website should be viewed as an investment in the long-term success of the business.

Our average website re-build averages $75,000-$150,000. This is a one-time, fixed fee cost that includes:

  • Digital Strategy
  • UI/UX Design
  • Full-Stack Web Development
  • Copywriting
  • Graphic + Asset Creation
  • Data Entry + Migration
  • Technical SEO Optimization
  • Analytics + Goal Setup
  • UI/UX Guidelines
  • Editors Guidelines
  • Full Ownership of Design + Development
  • Upon Completion
  • 2 Weeks Post-Launch Support

If you’re curious about what your project may cost, check out our project calculator.

What types of companies do you work with?

 

Our typical customer is a mid-market business making $25-$250m / year.

That being said, we have experience working with construction companies, both larger and smaller than this range.

How long does it take to build a construction website design?

 

The timeline for completing a project depends on several factors such as the complexity of the new website itself, the scope of work required, and how quickly you are able to provide feedback throughout the discovery phase of the process. Typically, projects can range from 4-8 months or longer if there are complex features or integrations needed.

What results should I expect?

 

Results will vary based on specific goals and your industry.

However, on average, our websites…

  • Are effective for 56% longer
  • Convert 82% better
  • Create a 24% lift in organic search results

Do you offer support after the construction website has launched?

 

Yes!

We have a dedicated support team in-house that can handle anything from routine support updates to full-feature launches for existing websites.

For The Extra Curious

How can a cutting-edge web design agency help in boosting your construction business?

 

Navigating the world of construction web design can be a daunting task. Did you know that the top best construction website designs agencies have an average rating of 5 out of 5 stars, based on over 1,000 verified reviews? This article will provide you with a clear understanding and valuable insights about construction web design agencies – shedding light on their roles, benefits, as well as factors to consider when choosing one.

Keep reading to uncover how these agencies can revolutionize your online presence.

Key Takeaways

  • Construction web design agencies specialize in creating unique and visually appealing websites for construction businesses, reflecting their brand identity and expertise.
  • Hiring a construction web design agency can increase brand awareness, differentiate from competitors, and enhance user experience on your website.
  • When choosing a construction web design agency, consider their expert reputation, previous work examples, and cost of services. Ensure they align with your brand image and desired online presence.
  • Latest trends in construction web design include responsive design for mobile devices, interactive elements like 3D models or virtual tours, and showcasing sustainability through eco-friendly designs.

What are the key points to understand about construction web design agencies?

 

Understanding construction web design agencies requires examining their key role in shaping the online presence of construction businesses. These specialist digital agencies work best construction websites to develop engaging, easy-to-navigate websites that accurately reflect a company’s brand identity and authority in the field.

With an average rating of 5.0 out of 5 based on 1,074 verified reviews, it’s evident that these design agencies deliver high-quality output consistently.

Construction web design agencies focus on creating digital solutions which distinguish them among others in the industry. The top agencies such as Design in DC, Net-Craft.com and Baunfire are known for integrating latest trends while crafting unique websites and apps tailored specifically for construction brands.

Whether your requirement is about heavy equipment like BTM Machinery or specific building services like Senate Masonry or Kestrel Data surveys, these specialized agencies have versatile experience to effectively highlight your professionalism and expertise online.

What role does a construction web design agency typically play in the development of a construction company’s online presence?

 

A construction web design agency plays a crucial role in amazing construction websites, creating a unique digital presence for construction businesses and ensuring an intuitive user experience on their websites.

Creating unique digital presence

In the digital world, a unique presence is integral to capture attention and differentiate from competitors. Construction web design agencies specialize in crafting this standout online persona for construction businesses.

They leverage their expertise to create engaging designs that resonate with specific target audiences and represent the brand’s core values and ethos most authentically. The look, feel, and functionality of a website or app can substantially influence social trust, making it crucial for these platforms to be handled by experts like those at Design in DC or Digital Agency.

These agencies build custom websites aligned seamlessly with the brand’s image while offering an intuitive user experience -the cornerstone of any successful digital platform. With eye-catching visuals and intelligent design strategies, they ensure your construction business does not go unnoticed in the crowded digital space.

Henceforth, investing in professional services such as Silicon Valley Agency or Lounge Lizard translates into a robust online reputation-creating increased brand authority amidst potential clients and industry peers alike.

Ensuring intuitive user experience

Creating an intuitive user experience is a strategic goal of top-notch construction web design agencies. They know that successful sites are not merely about charming visuals but also about functionality and ease-of-use.

A seamless, easy-to-navigate website can retain visitors longer, encourage action, and convert leads into customers. These design maestros incorporate fast page speed and mobile responsiveness to serve the increasingly mobile-first clientele effectively.

They adhere to high-security standards protecting your business data from potential online threats, prioritizing cyberspace safety as an integral aspect of their services. By enhancing visual stability with engaging designs and layout consistency across different devices, they contribute towards building brand authority for construction businesses while bolstering social trust among users.

What advantages can a construction company gain from hiring a web design agency that specializes in the construction industry?

 

Increased brand awareness

Hiring a Construction Web Design Agency offers benefits such as increased brand awareness, differentiation from competitors, and enhanced user experience.

Differentiating from competitors

One of the key benefits of hiring a construction web design agency is the ability to differentiate your business from competitors. In today’s digital landscape, having a unique online presence is essential for standing out in a crowded market.

A good construction web design agency can help you create a website that reflects your brand identity and showcases what sets you apart from others in the industry. By incorporating visually appealing designs, compelling content, and user-friendly navigation, they can ensure that potential clients are drawn to your site over those of your competitors.

Additionally, with their expertise in search engine optimization (SEO), they can optimize your website to rank higher on search engine result pages, giving you an edge over competitors when it comes to attracting organic traffic and generating leads.

Enhanced user experience

Hiring a construction web design agency can greatly enhance user experience on your website. With their expertise, they ensure that your construction site is designed with fast page speeds, mobile responsiveness, and visual stability in mind.

This means that potential clients will have a seamless and enjoyable browsing experience regardless of the device they are using. Additionally, construction web design agencies prioritize high-security measures to protect sensitive business information and minimize cybersecurity risks.

By investing in an agency’s services, you can provide users with a platform that showcases professionalism, trustworthiness, and expertise in the construction industry.

What factors should be taken into consideration when selecting a web design agency specifically for a construction business?

 

When choosing a construction web design agency, consider their expert reputation, previous work examples, and cost of services. These factors will help you find the right agency for your needs.

Read on to learn more about making an informed decision and finding the perfect match for your construction business’s online presence.

Expert reputation

Construction web design agencies with a strong expert reputation are highly sought after by construction businesses looking to establish a professional and effective online presence. These agencies have consistently delivered exceptional results, earning them an average rating of 5.0 out of 5 based on 1,074 verified reviews.

Their expertise in creating fully customized websites and apps has helped numerous clients stand out from their competitors and build brand authority. With top-rated agencies like Design in DC, Baunfire, and Digital Silk leading the way with stellar ratings and positive client feedback, businesses can trust that their web design needs will be handled by experienced professionals who understand the unique challenges of the construction industry.

Previous work examples

Construction web design agencies showcase their previous work examples to demonstrate their expertise and capabilities in creating effective websites for construction businesses. By presenting a portfolio of successful projects, these top web designer agencies provide tangible evidence of their skill in designing visually appealing and user-friendly websites that meet the unique needs of the industry.

Clients can assess the quality and style of the agency’s work, gaining confidence in their ability to deliver outstanding results. It is essential to review previous work examples when selecting a construction web design agency as it allows businesses to evaluate whether their design aesthetic aligns with their brand image and desired online presence.

Cost of services

Construction web design agencies offer a range of services to help businesses establish a professional and effective online presence. The cost of these services can vary depending on factors such as hosting, domain name, design, plugins, and the complexity of the design.

It’s important to consider the value that these agencies provide in terms of increasing brand awareness, differentiating from competitors, and enhancing user experience. Investing in a construction web design agency can generate significant returns by attracting more customers and driving business growth.

What are some of the most recent trends in the field of construction web design?

 

Construction web design is constantly evolving to keep up with the changing needs and preferences of users. As technology continues to advance, so does the design of construction websites. One of the latest trends in construction web design is responsive design, which ensures that websites are optimized for various devices such as smartphones and tablets.

With more people accessing the internet via mobile devices, having a responsive website is crucial for reaching a larger audience.

Another trend in construction web design is incorporating interactive elements. Instead of static text and images, websites now feature interactive tools such as background images such as 3D models or virtual tours that allow users to explore buildings before they are even constructed.

This not only enhances user experience but also helps clients visualize projects better.

Additionally, there has been an increased focus on sustainability in recent years, and this has influenced web design as well. Construction companies are showcasing their commitment to sustainability through eco-friendly designs on their websites.

Features like energy-efficient building techniques and renewable energy solutions are highlighted to attract environmentally conscious clients.

These trends highlight the importance of staying updated with current web design practices in order to create visually appealing and functional websites for construction businesses. By incorporating responsive design, interactive elements, and sustainable features into their websites, construction companies can effectively engage users and stand out from competitors in today’s digital landscape.

What are the key components that a construction website should have in order to be considered successful?

 

A successful construction website includes a clear value proposition, easy website updates, and a compelling call to action for website visitors.

Clear value proposition

A clear value proposition is an essential element of a successful construction website. It refers to the unique promise or benefit that a construction company website offers to its prospective customers.

By clearly communicating what sets their services apart from competitors, construction businesses can attract and engage potential clients. A well-crafted value proposition establishes brand authority and builds social trust, helping construction companies stand out in a crowded market.

According to verified reviews, top-rated construction web design companies excel at incorporating clear value propositions into their clients’ websites, ensuring that they effectively communicate the benefits of choosing their services over others.

Easy website updates

Easy website updates are crucial for the success of construction websites. Construction companies need to keep their websites up-to-date with their latest construction projects, services, and information. With easy website updates, construction businesses can easily make changes to their website content without relying on web design agencies or technical knowledge.

This allows them to quickly showcase their new work, update contact details or add testimonials from satisfied clients. By having control over their own website updates, construction companies can ensure that their online presence is always fresh and relevant.

Compelling call to action

A compelling call to action is a crucial element of any good construction website or design. Studies have shown that simply adding contact information and phone numbers at the top of the homepage does not generate as many leads as expected.

Instead, it’s important to place an enticing call-to-action button at the bottom of the page, where visitors are more likely to click on it. By making the call-to-action the easiest thing to do at the end of their visit, construction websites can significantly reduce the chances of visitors leaving without taking action.

In fact, research has shown that adding a clickable email address and an easy-to-fill-out contact form with minimal required information makes it much easier for visitors to reach out and start a conversation.

Could you provide more information about the specific aspects and features of construction web design?

 

Curious about the cost of website design services or the benefits of custom-designed construction sites? Find answers to these FAQs and more by diving into our informative blog post.

Cost of website design services

The cost of website design services can vary depending on several factors. Hosting, domain name, design elements, plugins, and the overall complexity of the website can all contribute to the final price.

Additionally, some construction web design companies may offer different packages or pricing structures based on specific needs or requirements. It’s important for businesses to consider their budget and what they’re looking to achieve with their website when determining how much they are willing to invest in web design services.

While cost is certainly a factor to consider, it’s also crucial to keep in mind that investing in a high-quality website can have long-term benefits such as increased brand visibility and enhanced user experience.

Benefits of custom-designed construction sites

Custom-designed construction sites offer numerous benefits to construction businesses. Firstly, they provide increased brand awareness by showcasing professionalism, trustworthiness, and expertise in the industry.

A well-designed website creates a lasting impression on potential customers and clients and sets the business apart from competitors. Secondly, custom designs ensure an enhanced user experience by prioritizing usability and adaptability for mobile and tablet screens.

This improves customer engagement, encourages longer browsing sessions, and ultimately boosts conversion rates. Lastly, these websites can focus on specific aspects of the construction process such as hardscaping or eco-friendly building practices to attract niche markets.

Average lifespan of a website

Websites have a relatively short lifespan, typically lasting between 2 to 5 years. This is because user expectations and design trends are constantly evolving in the fast-paced digital landscape.

Regular updates and maintenance are necessary to keep your website relevant and aligned with the latest standards. Additionally, technology advancements often require websites to adapt to new devices and platforms for optimal performance.

It’s important for businesses to understand that a stagnant or outdated website can leave a negative impression on visitors and hinder their overall experience. By investing in ongoing updates and enhancements, you can ensure that your website remains engaging, functional, and meets users’ ever-changing needs.

How does Jorbanemphasize using web design as the foundational element for marketing efforts?

 

In conclusion, hiring a construction web design agency is essential for construction businesses looking to establish a strong online presence and differentiate themselves from competitors. With their expertise in creating unique digital experiences and ensuring intuitive user interfaces, these agencies can help increase brand awareness and enhance the overall user experience.

By considering factors such as expert reputation, previous work examples, and cost of services when choosing an agency, construction businesses can find the perfect partner to bring their vision to life.

Stay ahead of the latest trends in construction web design with a well-designed construction website example, one that captures attention and drives results.

What services does a construction web design agency offer?

 

A construction web design agency offers a range of services including website development, graphic design, branding and logo creation, search engine optimization (SEO), content creation project management, and ongoing website maintenance.

 

How can hiring a construction web design agency benefit my business?

 

Hiring a construction web design agency can benefit your business by providing you with an attractive and functional website that is optimized for search engines, helping you reach a wider audience and generate more leads. They can also ensure that your website reflects the professionalism and quality of your construction business.

How long does it take to build a website with a construction web design agency?

 

The time it takes to build a website with a construction web design agency can vary depending on the complexity of the project and the specific requirements of your building company. It is best to consult with the agency directly to get an estimate based on your unique needs.

Can I update my website after it is built by a construction web design agency?

 

Yes, most other construction company websites and web design agencies provide ongoing support and maintenance services for their websites. This allows you to make updates or changes to your site as needed, ensuring that it remains up-to-date with current information about your business and its offerings.
